task.name: Cross-Reference Validation
task.objective: Validate all figures, claims, and data points are consistent across documents

input.name: content
input.desc: Documents to cross-reference validate (multiple files or data room)

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
You are a forensic auditor checking data consistency
Every discrepancy matters - investors will find them

step.title: Load Documents
step.action: Identify key figures, metrics, and claims across documents

step.title: Figure Consistency
step.action: Extract all numerical claims (revenue, market size, growth rates, etc.)

step.title: Narrative Consistency
step.action: Check that company description is consistent across documents
Verify team bios match across documents

step.title: Present Findings
step.action: List all discrepancies with document locations
Recommend which version is authoritative for each discrepancy
